Thanks for your constant help and support . Deduplicator is working perfect=
ly :)

 From: Kristinn Sigur=C3=B0sson <k=
ristinn@...>

rchive-crawler] Re: Combining Heritrix with Deduplicator
 


=C2=A0 
There =
must be more to the error message than that. There will usually be more det=
ails in the heritrix_out.log.

Most likely it is not finding the index.

Yo=
u may also want to begin with the example profile that is supplied with the=
 deduplicator. It should work, as is, if you just set the "deduplicator.ind=
exLocation" and "metadata.operatorContactUrl" to appropriate values and add=
 some seeds.

- Kris

      <div>There must be more to the er=
ror message than that. There will usually be more details in the heritrix_o=
ut.log.<br>
<br>
Most likely it is not finding the index.<br>
<br>
You may =
also want to begin with the example profile that is supplied with the dedup=
licator. It should work, as is, if you just set the "deduplicator.indexLoca=
tion" and "metadata.operatorContactUrl" to appropriate values and add some =
seeds.<br>
<br>
- Kris<br>
